movies.title: Bunga Berduri
movies.description: Dari luar, Baek Hee Sung terlihat seperti suami yang ideal. Sebagai seorang pengrajin yang rajin bekerja, studio pengerjaan logamnya telah berhasil meraih kesuksesan.

movies.title: 10 Tahun Berkorban, Dia Malah Dikhianati
movies.description: Pemuda itu setia 10 tahun, tapi dikhianati pacar dan selingkuhannya. Dia menarik bantuan, pacanya menyesal.

movies.title: Pear Dreams
movies.description: An adventure through orchards and dreams where reality meets fantasy. A visual masterpiece that explores the beauty of nature.

movies.title: The Harvest
movies.description: A documentary-style film about the annual pear harvest and the families who dedicate their lives to this ancient tradition.

movies.title: Sweet Symphony
movies.description: A musical journey through seasons, featuring the lifecycle of pear trees and the symphony of nature's sounds.

movies.title: Orchard Mysteries
movies.description: A thriller set in an abandoned orchard where secrets from the past come to light. Mystery and suspense await.

movies.title: The Last Pear
movies.description: A post-apocalyptic tale where the last remaining pear tree holds the key to humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Golden Cat
movies.description: A heartwarming story about a magical pear that brings people together. Follow the journey of discovery and friendship in this enchanting tale.
